segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a two-step stool, reaching for something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, almost horizontal, towards an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed, and it's tilted backward precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of fear just watching him, he's so high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's clearly trying to get cookies from a jar labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is inside the jar, the other holds a plate, perhaps to catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could tip over at any second, it's horrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I am so surprised he hasn't fallen already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really taking a risk just for a few sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is an accident waiting to happen, I'm sure of it.
segments.speaker: PAR
